ack.title: ACKNOWLEDGMENTS
ack.p: We thank Michael Scherer‐Lorenzen and Filippo Bussotti for assisting in the tree core sampling procedure and the Ispettorato Generale del Corpo Forestalle dello Stato for sampling authorizations. MF received a PhD grant for RDM from the FunDivEUROPE project, European Union Seventh Framework Programme (FP7/2007‐2013 grant no. 265171).
